tagline: Turns messy workflows into clean Airtable systems that non-technical teams can maintain.
pros: Bridges the gap between spreadsheets and custom software
Strong relational data modeling with accessible interface design
Builds systems that non-technical users can maintain and extend
Automation expertise from simple triggers to complex multi-step workflows
